data.title: SHIMLA (SML) to KALKA (KLK) Trains: Tickets, Fare and Availability
data.meta_description: Book SHIMLA to KALKA train ticket online and check timing, fare, seat availability and train schedule on RailYatri.
data.text:
Shimla to Kalka train route

Trains are the preferred mode of travel for over a thousand commuters on the Shimla to Kalka train route, one of the most popular destinations in India. Everyday, many travellers commute on the Shimla to Kalka railway route, and as many as 6 IRCTC trains run between the two stations, i.e., Shimla to Kalka . Shimla to Kalka are approximately 94 Kilometres apart from one another.

Shimla to Kalka Train Ticket Price

The Shimla to Kalka train ticket fare depends on various factors, such as preferred seat, routes selected, and date of journey. At RailYatri, the Shimla to Kalka train ticket price is affordable for all train travellers. Depending on the budget, one can reserve a third AC (3A) coach, a second AC (2A) coach, as well as the first AC (1A) coach on a train from Shimla to Kalka

Shimla to Kalka train time

The Shimla to Kalka train takes between 4 Hours 35 Minutes to 5 Hours 55 Minutes. The traveller can select a train based on their preferences among every day trains such as SHIMLA - KALKA Rail Motor (72452), SHIMLA - KALKA NG Passenger (52458), SHIMLA - KALKA Him Darshan Express (52460), Shimla - Kalka Shivalik Deluxe Express (52452), Shimla - Kalka Himalayan Queen (52456) and others. One can also choose from trains like SHIMLA - KALKA Rail Motor (72452), SHIMLA - KALKA NG Passenger (52458), SHIMLA - KALKA Him Darshan Express (52460), Shimla - Kalka Shivalik Deluxe Express (52452), Shimla - Kalka Himalayan Queen (52456) that run on a weekly basis. The RailYatri app and website allow users to check the live train running status, Tatkal train tickets and PNR status etc.

Book your Shimla to Kalka train journey with RailYatri.in

RailYatri.in helps you plan your train journey better with its accurate information on all possible railway enquiries. Train and railway reservation enquiries like Shimla to Kalka seat availability, Shimla to Kalka correct time table, Shimla to Kalka list of scheduled trains, Shimla to Kalka train status, Shimla to Kalka train fare calculator You can easily book your IRCTC train tickets online with RailYatri, an official partner of IRCTC.

RailYatri.in can help you plan a stress-free trip.

We make each booking a hassle-free experience for our travellers. Explore the trending deals and offers at the best price on the Shimla to Kalka trains. Download the RailYatri app to stay updated on the latest IRCTC information via our train enquiry centre and train travel blogs for insights. You can view information on Shimla to Kalka live train running status and PNR status on the RailYatri app. Visit the royal city of Lucknow in the most convenient way possible! Immerse yourself in the royal city of Lucknow! yourself in its culture, art and history.

Q) How far is Kalka from Shimla by train?

A) The Shimla to Kalka distance is 94 . Being one of the popular railway routes, several IRCTC trains run between Shimla and Kalka ( SML to KLK ).

Q) How many trains runs between Shimla and Kalka everyday?

A) There are 6 trains to book between Shimla & Kalka everyday. Travellers can check the correct train timings and fare on the RailYatri app.

Q) How many trains runs between Shimla & Kalka on a weekly basis?

A) There are 6 trains running between Shimla & Kalka . You can book train tickets with FREE Cancellation from RailYatri!

Q) Which is the fastest train that runs between Shimla and Kalka station?

A) The fastest train from Shimla to Kalka is Shimla - Kalka Shivalik Deluxe Express which covers a distance of 94 Kilometers in approximately 4 H 35 M hours.

Q) At what time does the first train depart from Shimla to Kalka Station?

A) The first train from Shimla to Kalka leaves at 11:40 Hrs from Shimla . Book this train from the FASTEST train ticket booking app - RailYatri

Q) What is the train ticket price from Shimla to Kalka Station?

A) Shimla to Kalka Train Ticket Prices start from Rs. 0 . You can book trains tickets to travel between Shimla to Kalka from RailYatri App.
